attributes.action: British Background Checks on Citizens.Must have 300+ years as British Bloodline
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We see in this country today the Goverment giving Big Hand Out`s to those coming Legally & Illegally to this country.
 We see Scotland,Wales & N.Ireland all wanting there Own Path away from British control.
 Well I think We the British people deserve a Reward for being British & Not the Down trodded that our Goverments of late have helped achieve for us.
 I therefore suggest the Goverment SHOULD Give finacial Reward to Citizens who`s Bloodlines meet at least 300 years of British Bloodline.
  Also a certificate of British heritage SHOULD be given to those who complete this background check.  

It`s about time we British were Allowed to be proud of being British than ashamed or worse yet told we are NOT.
